LanguageData.VME_Violence_Honorable.stages.0.label: attacked harmless person
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Honorable.stages.0.descript: I have used deadly force on a harmless adversary. This proves our strength and our resolve.
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Disapproved.stages.0.label: attacked harmless person
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Disapproved.stages.0.descri: I have used deadly force on a harmless adversary. This is wrong.
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: attacked person
LanguageData.VME_Violence_Abhorrent.stages.0.descript: I have used deadly force on an adversary. It brings great shame.
